Plot: Twenty years ago at summer camp, Paul Copeland's sister died in the woods, the alleged victim of a serial killer. Her body was never found. Now, Paul is the prosecutor for Essex County, New Jersey, immersed in one of the biggest cases of his career-a case that will change everything he believes about the past...and the truth.
Characters: Paul Copeland, Cingle Shaker, Loren Muse
Setting: Newark, New Jersey (United States), New Jersey (United States)
